base_description: Black rectangular keyboard with standard layout.
part_description: Contains multiple rows of keys, including letters, numbers, and function keys. Numeric keypad on the right side. Indicator lights located above the numeric keypad.
internal_interaction_description: Keys are spring-loaded, returning to position after being pressed. Pressing a key sends an electronic signal through the internal circuitry to communicate with the connected device. Indicator lights illuminate to show status of functions like Caps Lock and Num Lock.
external_interaction_description: Connects to a computer via USB or wireless connection. Users interact by pressing keys to input data or commands, which the computer processes. Can be used for typing, gaming, or controlling software applications.
